body_html:
Thanks Carsten!
re: 2) Computer says: no new.html in conferences. The funny thing is, the /new-part is read as if it is an id- param, so the show-view is called. I think now that it has to do with the conference helper method here, but I am not sure how to solve it. It is tempting to do a regular find_resource ?

re:3) Missed a view things ;-)

re: 4) I am going to call you LinkMeister from now on. And I will watch my hats. Thnx

re: 2) Computer says: no new.html in conferences. The funny thing is, the /new-part is read as if it is an id- param, so the show-view is called.  I think now that it has to do with the conference helper method here, but I am not sure how to solve it. It is tempting to do a regular find_resource ?

body:
Thanks Carsten! 
re: 2) Computer says: no `new.html` in `conferences`. The funny thing is, the `/new`-part is read as if it is an `id`\- param, so the `show`-view is called.  ~~I think now that it has to do with the conference helper method [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/pull/546/files#diff-7fbe00a3a9ebba1c66f31e2057134f9aR12), but I am not sure how to solve it. It is tempting to do a regular `find_resource` ?~~ 

re:3) Missed a view things ;-)

re: 4) I am going to call you LinkMeister from now on.  And I will watch my hats. Thnx
